_header: To Thee most peerless Prince of Peace
_description: ‘Miserere mei Deus’ — eight 8-line stanzas with this refrain

NLS3473.First Lines:
To the maist peirlas prince of peceWith all my power I þe
                    pray…
NLS3473.Last Lines:
…gud heir ws quhen we Reid or syngof miserere mei
                    deus
NLS3473.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             The Middle English Penitential Lyric.
Columbia University Studies in English.
         New York: Columbia Press, 1911: 89-91.
Stevenson,  George. 
             Pieces from the Makculloch and the Gray MSS. together with The Chepman
                and Myllar Prints.
Scottish Text Society
         65. Edinburgh, 1918: 51-3.
